name: Wisdom Of the Insane Volume #1 3D FPS / horror game
name_original: Wisdom Of the Insane Volume #1 3D FPS / horror game
description:
Before you download !! 

I UPLOADED DEMO VERSION 2 !! you can fin it here :

https://thomaaasmix.itch.io/wi...

DEMO VERSION 2 is much much better, more props, better lighting and tons of new stuff added ! nut you can also still download this verion if you want ;)

Wisdom Of The Insane.

---WOTI--- Volume #1

My first Unity 5 game.

Its an Horror style 3D FPS game.

This is a DEMO VERSION ! not the full game.

Programming  by : TVM

Story by : TVM

Basic Animations by : TVM

Level Design by : TVM

Music by : Ross Budgen ( please check him out on Youtube he is awsome ! )

Special thanks to : Jimmy vegas (for making the best Youtube tutorials on gamedevelopment !)

I am no pro programmer by any means so please dont expect much, what you see in the Youtube video is what you get.

So far i have been working on this game for only 4 days.

This demo is 100% free to download and play.

Please please give me your feedback on the game if you play it ;) that would be awsome !

(this game is build from mostly free models from the Unity asset store)

(Except for the FPS arms and the gun , those are payed models that i bought from the asset store)

!! Please do not play on these graphics settings :

*Fastest

*Fast

*Simple

The game wont work ! , this issue is now fixed in the newer version that i will upload in a few days, please follow progress on this game on my Youtube channel.

You can expect many many more updates to come for this game.
